item.title: Chime backer Lauren Kolodny bets on AI to revolutionize estate processing
item.description: Acrew Capital's Kolodny led a $20 million Series A in Alix, a startup that uses AI to automate estate processing.

item.title: The Very Real Case for Brain-Computer Implants
item.description: On this episode of Uncanny Valley, we dive into the heated race between two companies to build a commercial brain-computer interface.

item.description: In red-hot acquisition market, this CVector founders answer this key question in its first conversation with prospective customers.

item.title: AI companions: A threat to love, or an evolution of it?
item.description: As AI companions from companies like Replika, Character AI, and Nomi AI abound, love is no longer strictly human. In this debate, we ask the question ...

item.title: Apple iOS 26 public beta arrives
item.description: Apple released iOS 26 in public beta. Here's everything you can expect, from the Liquid Glass design to features powered by Apple Intelligence.
